====== OIPA ======

OIPA is an open-source framework that renders IATI compliant XML and related indicator files into the OIPA datamodel for storage and I/O using the OIPA Tastypie API which renders XML and JSON output. Does Django and MySQL. Fork it at [[https://github.com/openaid-IATI/OIPA|OIPA at Github]]
